name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore Last Closed Tab in Context Menu

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restore a closed tab using a context menu option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a context menu button which restores the last closed tab.

That's all it does! :)
